title: 为什么我这次mc打不开? 求解
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to E:\\My Documents\\MC\\.minecraft\\crash-reports\\crash-2013-02-20_16.32.52-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(
